content: a 6 row pattern repeat making beautiful lacy waves and textures using just double and single_crochet stitches for a long wrap or scarf materials -- 200g/646 yds base yarn and 100g/323 yds contrasting yarn -- 4 5mm hook -- scissors and needle for finishing concentration level once you have the 6 row down the rest is easy for a mindless project with the colour changes to keep it fun
